column6: BULLSEYE PART 1 Norman Osborn is through playing around with Deadpool-it's time to send in the big guns. The big, crazy guns that never, ever miss. He may be wearing a new costume, but he's still the same ol' psychopath...
column8: | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Paco Medina | penciller:Jason Pearson | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Daniel Way
